home.title: A path to a brighter tomorrow. Reconnecting communities to transform homelessness

content.0: This map is a tool to reconnect our communities so we can effectivly support each other through difficult times
content.1: The Brighter Tomorrow Map is built for you by volunteers at the Focallocal Positive Action Community
content.2: A global Movement for anyone who has had enough of the issues troubling this world and are taking action to build change
content.3: This map aims to help people who are homeless find the resources they need to meet their basic needs and begin a path to a brighter future

items.smiley: find + post free resources to meet basic needs
items.friends: connect with people who want to help, or those nearby who need it
items.share: offer things you can do to support people locally who need them

content.0: Use the map to find and post all the free resources in your local area. showers. food. shelter. washing machines. support groups
content.1: Many people nearby want to support you building a happier life. Their kind offers can be found on the map
content.2: Please don't ask for money, its not what this map is for. Many charities now advise people not to, and so it risks pushing away those who are trying to help you
content.3: People will help, but only you can change life. Focus on one step towards the life you want each day and it will get better

content.0: Print the map as a valuable guide to give those on the streets, helping them access resources to improve and change their situation
content.1: The helpless feeling of walking past people who are sleeping on the streets, wanting to help but not knowing what you can do. That changes today!
content.2: Browse suggestions for things you can offer on the map to support people struggling nearby, like;
content.3: CV/resume building help. Teach a skill. An intro, old books and advice on starting in your profession. Or simply a cup of tea, or a meal to share a friendly chat and some normality
content.4: Post free resources you find onto the map. suit hire for interviews. shelters or religious buildings offering showers. support groups. pass it on coffee. where to find free food

section_titles.3: 4. Any Requirements for Accessing the Resource
section_titles.4: 5. Describe how can someone find it/you

subs.0: 'Choose a category' and post your resource
subs.1: 'Suggestions' browse ideas of what you can offer
subs.2: 'Offer a Resource' to suggest an new positive action

congratsModal.subtitle: We're one step closer to a happier and more connected World

text.0: Simply click the buttons above and copy/paste the info below.
text.2: Join the Global Movement for Positive Change at www.focallocal.org

sub.0: This website has been created by volunteers at the Focallocal Positive Action Community as part of our mission if local action for global change. Find out more and join us at

0.1: This is a tool to transform homelessness around the world by connecting people, communities and ideas. Click on the buttons bellow to explore what you can do here.
0.3: Explore free resources available nearby to meet basic needs and to begin on a path to a brighter future.

5.0: Double click on map to zoom in.
5.1: Then click on a dot to read more about an available free resource, or a community offer.

7.0: Click + to add a free resource you've found nearby to help those who are homeless connect with
7.1: (shelters, public toilets, addiction support groups, free suit hire for interviews, etc)
7.2: or to offer a resource something you can do for those living on the streets nearby
7.3: Click '?' find great ideas of effective things you can offer to help from around the world.

9.0: Print a guide of valuable support and resources available in your local area to give out to people who are homeless on the streets.
9.1: Or as a useful poster for a wall or window (full functionality coming soon).

0.15: to search by date, location and resource
0.17: to see more from Focallocal Positive community.
0.19: to join out volunteer community creating a world with more peace and happiness.
